QuestData.Title: The Spare Suit
QuestData.Description: Very well, your king's secret is safe with me as long as he continues to help us against our enemies.$B$BHere, take this to him. I cleaned it up nicely, though I have no idea why he needs a second disguise.$B$BMaybe he has something in mind for you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Return King Mrgl-Mrgl's Spare Suit to him at Winterfin Retreat.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have my spare suit, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: <Upon seeing the spare murloc suit, the king rubs his costumed appendages together.>$B$BNicely done. Now, back to the pressing matter at hand. I've got something of great importance for you to do.
